input_email_body:
Subject: Enhancing Data Encryption for Medical Records on Android Devices

I am reaching out to request assistance with improving the encryption of medical records on my Android device that is currently protected by Bitdefender antivirus. The current encryption measures are inadequate, and I require detailed instructions or recommendations for additional security protocols My name is Liu Wei.. Please provide me with step-by-step guidance or resource recommendations to better secure sensitive medical information. Thank you for your time and support. You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.
